reference: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translation: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under the Peshawar Constitution.

source: 当地时间上午约十时，伊斯兰圣城麦加的一家旅馆坍塌了。
reference: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translation: At about 10 a.m., a mosque in the holy city of Mecca collapsed.

source: 这栋楼里住着一些朝圣者，他们是在麦加朝圣前夕来到这座圣城的。
reference: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translation: This building is inhabited by pilgrims who are visiting the holy city of Mecca during the holy month of Ramadan.

source: 旅馆的客人大多是阿联酋公民。
reference: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translation: The hotel's guests are mostly from the UAE.

source: 死亡人数至少为 15 人，预计还会增加。
reference: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translation: The death toll is at least 15, and the number is likely to increase.

source: 被称为“11 号宇航员”的列昂诺夫是苏联最早的宇航员团队中的一员。
reference: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translation: Leonov was the first person to be named as the 11th astronaut of the Soviet Union.

source: 1965 年 3 月 18 日，他完成了首次载人舱外活动（ EVA，俗称“太空漫步”），在航天器外独自维持了 12 分钟多一点。
reference: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translation: In 1965, he completed his first manned spacewalk (EVA) in space, in the outer space, for 12 minutes and a half.

source: 由于工作表现出色，他获得了苏联最高荣誉“苏联英雄”的称号。
reference: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translation: He was awarded the highest honor of the Soviet Union, the Soviet Hero.

source: 十年之后，他领导了阿波罗-联盟号任务的苏联部分，这标志着太空竞赛已经结束。
reference: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translation: In ten years, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-联盟 mission, marking the end of the space race.

source: 她说：“没有情报表明近期会有袭击发生。
reference: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translation: She said: "No information has been received indicating that there is any imminent threat.

source: “然而，把威胁等级降到严重级别并不意味着整体威胁已经消失。”
reference: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translation: However, the threat level to the country is not necessarily the same as the overall threat.

source: 尽管当局还不确定威胁是否属实，但马里兰运输局在联邦调查局的敦促下关闭了该设施。
reference: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translation: The Maryland Transportation Authority has been told by the Federal Bureau of Investigation that it is not certain whether the threat is true.

source: 自卸卡车用来封锁隧道入口， 80 名警察于现场协助指挥驾车者绕行。
reference: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translation: The truck was used to block the entrance to the tunnel, 80 police were on the scene to assist the driver.

source: 在该市的备用线路即环城高速公路上，没有出现严重的交通延误。
reference: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translation: In the city's emergency road, there was no major traffic jam.

source: 尼日利亚日前宣布，计划在峰会召开的前一周内加入非洲大陆自由贸易区 (AfCFTA)。
reference: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translation: Nigeria has announced that it will join the AfCFTA in the first week of the summit.

source: 非洲联盟贸易和工业专员艾伯特·穆坎加宣布贝宁将加入联盟。
reference: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translation: The African Union Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Mukama announced Benin to join the African Union.

source: 特派员表示：“我们尚未就原产地规则和关税协定达成一致，但我们现有的框架足以满足 2020 年 7 月 1 日开始贸易的需要。”
reference: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translation: The delegate said: "We are still not in agreement on the origin and tariffs rules and we have already established a framework that will meet the requirements of 7 January 2020."

source: 尽管早些时候在空间站任务中丢失了一个陀螺仪，但空间站一直保持着它的姿态，直到太空行走任务结束。
reference: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translation: Despite the loss of a陀螺仪 in the space station mission, the station remained in its current attitude until the spacewalk mission was over.

source: 据报告，焦立中（Chiao）和沙里波夫（Sharipov）与调姿推进器的距离是安全的。
reference: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translation: According to the report, the two pilots (Chiao and Sharipov) are safe from the propulsion system.

source: 俄罗斯地面控制中心启动了飞机，空间站随即恢复正常姿态。
reference: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translation: The Russian Space Station was reactivated and the satellite was returned to its normal attitude.

source: 作为发起指控的公司，领先的互联网服务提供商美国在线 (AOL) 的总部位于弗吉尼亚州，因此这起案件在弗吉尼亚州起诉。
reference: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translation: As the company accused, the leading Internet service provider, AOL, is located in Virginia, so this case is in Virginia.

source: 这是首次按照 2003 年颁布的法律来定罪，该法律旨在遏制未经请求就向用户邮箱发送大量电子邮件（又称垃圾邮件）的行为。
reference: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translation: This is the first time that the law has been applied to punish the sending of large amounts of spam (also known as junk mail).

source: 21 岁的杰西（Jesus）于 2017 年 1 月从巴西的帕尔梅拉斯足球俱乐部加盟曼城，据报道其转会费为 2700 万英镑。
reference: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester United from Brazil in January 2017 for a fee of 2700万 pounds.

source: 从那以后，这位巴西人代表该俱乐部参加了全部比赛中的 53 场，并打进了 24 球。
reference: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation: After that, the Brazilian represented the club in all 53 matches, scoring 24 goals.

source: 李博士还对感染了 H5N1 禽流感病毒的土耳其儿童尚未发病的报道表示关切。
reference: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about the reports of H5N1 cases in Turkey for children who have not yet been infected.

source: 他特别提到一些研究表明，在引发全球性疫情之前，这种疾病必须先降低自身的致命性。
reference: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation: He also mentioned some studies that suggest that the pandemic could have started before the disease was lethal.

source: 令人担心的是，如果流感症状不明显，患者可能会在日常生活中继续传染更多的人。
reference: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation: The worry is that if the symptoms are not severe, the patient may continue to spread the disease to others.

source: 科曼基金会 (Komen Foundation) 发言人莱斯利·昂恩 (Leslie Aun) 表示，该组织采用了一项新规定，不允许向正在接受法律调查的组织提供资助或资金。
reference: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation: The Komen Foundation's spokesman, Leslie Aun, said the organization has adopted a new policy that prohibits donations or funds from organizations being investigated by the law.

source: 科曼的政策让计划生育计划搁浅，因为在等待众议员克里夫·斯特恩斯 (Cliff Stearns) 执行的计划生育计划资金支出和报告调查结果。
reference: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translation: The policy of the Council of Ministers has led to the postponement of the planned family planning program, as the funds for the program and the results of its evaluation have not been available.

source: 作为众议院能源和商业委员会 (House Energy and Commerce Committee) 管理下的监督和调查小组委员会主席，斯特恩斯 (Stearns) 目前正在调查是否有利用税收通过计划生育资助堕胎的行为。
reference: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translation: As a member of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, Stearns is currently investigating whether there is any use of tax to fund abortion.

source: 前马萨诸塞州州长米特·罗姆尼星期二以超过 46% 的选票在佛罗里达州的共和党总统初选中获胜。
reference: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translation: The Massachusetts governor, Mitt Romney, won over 46 percent of the vote in Florida's Republican presidential primary.

source: 前美国众议院议长纽特·金里奇获得 32% 的选票，位居第二。
reference: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translation: The former US House Speaker, Newt Gingrich, received 32% of the vote, second in the poll.

source: 作为一个“赢者通吃”的州，佛罗里达州将所有 50 张选举代表票都投给了罗姆尼，使他在共和党提名中保持领先。
reference: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translation: Florida is a winner-takes-all state, and all 50 of the election representative votes were cast to Romney, making him the Republican nominee in the state.

source: 抗议活动的组织者称，大约有 10 万人出现在柏林、科隆、汉堡和汉诺威等德国城市。
reference: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translation: The organizers of the protest said that there were about 10,000 people in Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover.

source: 警方估计柏林有 6,500 名抗议者。
reference: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
translation: The police estimate that there are 6,500 protesters in Berlin.

source: 抗议还发生在巴黎、保加利亚的索非亚、立陶宛的维尔纽斯、马耳他的瓦莱塔、爱沙尼亚的塔林以及苏格兰的爱丁堡和格拉斯哥。
reference: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
translation: The protests took place in Paris, Bulgaria's Sofiya, Lithuania's Vilnius, Malta's Varna, Estonia's Tallinn and Scotland's Edinburgh and Glasgow.

source: 伦敦约有 200 人在主要的版权持有者的办公室外抗议。
reference: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
translation: There are about 200 people in the offices of the major copyright owners in London.

source: 上一个月，波兰签署《ACTA》时，国内爆发大规模抗议活动，致使波兰政府决定暂缓批准该协议。
reference: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
translation: In the previous month, Poland signed the ACTA, when the protests in Poland caused the government to suspend its approval of the agreement.

source: 拉脱维亚和斯洛伐克都推迟了加入 ACTA 的进程。
reference: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
translation: Latvia and Slovakia postponed their membership of ACTA.

source: 动物解放组织和皇家防止虐待动物协会 (RSPCA) 再次呼吁在澳大利亚所有屠宰场强制安装闭路电视摄像头。
reference: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
translation: Animal Liberation Organization and Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) have again urged all slaughterhouses in Australia to install CCTV cameras.

source: 英国皇家防止虐待动物协会 (RSPCA ) 新南威尔士州总督察大卫·奥沙纳西 (David O'Shannessy) 告诉 ABC，在澳大利亚监管和视察屠宰场应该是司空见惯的事。
reference: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
translation: RSPCA New South Wales Governor David O'Shannessy told ABC that the Australian government should be familiar with the way in which animal welfare is regulated and monitored in the UK.

source: “对那些照看动物的人，监控系统肯定会是一种强烈的暗示，那就是动物福利才是最重要的。”
reference: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
translation: "These people who care for animals will be reminded of the importance of animal welfare by the surveillance system."

source: 美国地质调查局国际地震地图显示，冰岛在前一周并未发生地震。
reference: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
translation: The US Geological Survey International Earthquake Map shows that Iceland did not experience any earthquakes in the previous week.

source: 冰岛气象局也报告说，在过去 48 小时内，赫克拉（Hekla）地区并没有发生地震活动。
reference: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
translation: The Icelandic Meteorological Agency also reported that in the past 48 hours there has been no earthquake activity in Hekla.

source: 导致相位变化的重大地震活动于 3 月 10 日发生在该火山顶部火山口的东北侧。
reference: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
translation: The major earthquake activity that caused the tilt of the volcano occurred on 3 October in the summit of the volcano.

source: 据报道，山底出现了与火山活动无关的乌云。
reference: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
translation: According to reports, there has been no volcanic activity reported in the mountains.

source: 这些云可能会让人们怀疑火山到底有没有真正喷发过。
reference: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
translation: These clouds could make people question whether the volcano really has erupted.

source: “Luno”号上载有 120-160 立方米的燃料。在发生故障后，大风和海浪把它推到了防波堤上。
reference: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
translation: The "Luno" ship has 120-160 cubic meters of fuel on board. The ship was damaged by the wind and waves when it was pulled over the barrier.

source: 直升机救出了 12 名船员，其中只有一人受伤，鼻骨骨折。
reference: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
translation: The helicopter rescued 12 crew members, of whom only one was injured, with a broken nose.

source: 这艘 100 米长的船是去装载常见的化肥货物的，起初官员们担心这艘船上装的货物可能会泄漏。
reference: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
translation: The 100-foot long ship is to be used to load common fertilizer cargo, and officials feared that the cargo might leak.

source: 修正议案在 2011 年就在两院通过了。
reference: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
translation: The amendment was passed in the two chambers in 2011.

source: 本次的立法会议进行了一处修改，先是众议院删除了其中的第二句话语，随后参议院在周一如法炮制，使其获准通过。
reference: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
translation: The House of Representatives has deleted the second sentence from the bill, and the Senate has followed suit, and has approved it.

source: 禁止同性民事结合的第二个语句未能通过，这可能会为未来的同性婚姻打开大门。
reference: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
translation: The second sentence of the prohibition of civil unions for same-sex couples was not passed, which could open the door for future same-sex marriages.

source: 在这一过程之后，下一届选举产生的立法机构，将在 2015 年或 2016 年再次审查 HJR-3 决议，确保它持续贯彻执行。
reference: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
translation: In the process of reviewing HJR-3, the next legislative body will be elected in 2015 or 2016 to review the HJR-3 resolution, ensuring that it continues to be implemented.

source: 除了导演电影，沃蒂埃的成就还包括 1973 年为反对他眼中的政治钳制而发起的绝食抗议。
reference: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
translation: He also has a filmography of his own, including 1973 when he launched a hunger strike to protest his political imprisonment.

source: 此次抗议使法国的法律得到修改。他的这种激进行为可以追溯到 15 岁那年，当时是二战时期，他奋不顾身地投身到法国保卫战中。
reference: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
translation: This protest has been made in French law. This was done in 15 years ago, when he was a young man in the middle of the Second World War.

source: 他在 1998 年出版了一本自传，记录了自己的生平事迹。
reference: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
translation: He published a memoir in 1998.

source: 20 世纪 60 年代，他回到刚刚独立的阿尔及利亚，教授电影导演知识。
reference: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
translation: In the 60s, he returned to Algeria to teach film director's knowledge.

source: 日本柔道选手、两枚奥运会金牌得主齐藤仁 (Hitoshi Saito) 逝世，享年 54 岁。
reference: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
translation: The Japanese boxing champion, two Olympic gold medals winner, Hitoshi Saito, has died at the age of 54.

source: 宣布的死因是肝内胆管癌。
reference: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
translation: The cause of death was liver cancer.

source: 周二，他在大阪去世。
reference: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
translation: He died on Tuesday in Osaka.

source: 作为前奥运冠军和世界冠军的齐藤仁，在去世前担任全日本柔道联盟训练委员会主席。
reference: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
translation: As a former Olympic champion and world champion, Mr. Saito was the chairman of the Japanese柔道联盟.

source: 至少有 100 人参加此次聚会，庆祝一对夫妇的结婚一周年纪念日。
reference: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
translation: There were at least 100 people present at the party celebrating the couple's wedding anniversary.

source: 官方称，这对夫妇原定于稍后举行正式的周年纪念活动。
reference: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
translation: The official said the couple was to hold a formal ceremony later this month.

source: 一年前，这对夫妇在德克萨斯州结婚，之后来到布法罗和亲友共同庆祝。
reference: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
translation: They were married in Texas in one year ago, and then moved to Florida to celebrate with their friends.

source: 这名30岁的丈夫出生于布法罗，是枪击案中的四名死者之一，但他的妻子没有受伤。
reference: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
translation: The husband is 30 years old, is a victim of the shooting, but his wife has not been injured.

source: 卡诺是一位鼎鼎有名但颇具争议的英语教师，他曾在现代教育和英皇教育任教，他声称，在职业生涯的巅峰时期，他有 9000 名学生。
reference: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
translation: Carno is a well-known but controversial English teacher, who has taught in modern education and in the Royal Education. He claims that in his peak years he had 9000 students.

source: 在他的笔记中，他使用了一些家长认为粗俗的词语，据称他也在课堂上讲过脏话。
reference: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
translation: In his notes, he used some of the parents' commonplace words, and he was also in class.

source: 现代教育集团指控他未经授权就在公交车上刊登大型广告，并谎称自己是首席英语教师。
reference: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
translation: The modern education group accuses him of violating the law by posting large advertisements on the bus, and claiming to be the chief English teacher.

source: 他也曾被指控侵犯版权，但没有受到起诉。
reference: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
translation: He was also accused of copyright infringement, but was not prosecuted.

source: 他教过的一个学生说，老师“会在课堂上使用俚语，在笔记里教授约会技巧，就像是学生的朋友一样。"
reference: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
translation: He taught a student that the teacher used "idiotic words" in class, and taught students how to date like a friend.

source: 在过去三十年里，尽管官方层面仍然是个共产主义国家，中国已经发展了市场经济。
reference: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
translation: In the past thirty years, despite official officialism still being communist, China has developed market economy.

source: 第一次经济改革是在邓小平的领导下进行的。
reference: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
translation: The first economic reform was carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.

source: 从那时候开始，中国的经济规模增长了 90 倍。
reference: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
translation: From that time on, China's economic size grew by 90 times.

source: 去年，中国的汽车出口量首次超过德国，并超越美国成为汽车出口最大的市场。
reference: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
translation: In the year of 2014, China's car exports reached the highest level in history, and surpassed Germany as the world's largest car market.

source: 中国的 GDP 有可能在 20 年内反超美国。
reference: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
translation: China's GDP could be in 20 years behind the United States.

source: 热带风暴“丹妮尔”在大西洋东部形成，它是 2010 年大西洋飓风季第四个获得命名的风暴。
reference: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
translation: The tropical storm "Danny" is forming in the eastern Atlantic Ocean, it is the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.

source: 这场风暴距离佛罗里达州迈阿密约 3000 英里，最大持续风速为每小时 40 英里（64 公里每小时）。
reference: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
translation: The storm is about 3000 miles away from Miami, Florida, and is expected to be strongest at 40 mph (64 km/h).

source: 美国国家飓风中心的科学家预测，丹妮尔在星期三前将增强为一场大飓风。
reference: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
translation: The National Hurricane Center forecasters predict that Daniel will strengthen into a major hurricane on Wednesday.

source: 鉴于风暴远未登陆，目前仍难以评估它对美国或加勒比地区的潜在影响。
reference: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
translation: Due to the storm's distance from the coast, it is not yet possible to assess the potential impact of the storm on the US or the Caribbean.

source: 博贝克出生于克罗地亚首都萨格勒布，在为贝尔格莱德游击队足球俱乐部效力时成名。
reference: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
translation: Born in Zagreb, he was a star in the Croatian national team.

source: 他于 1945 年加入球队，一直效力到 1958 年。
reference: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
translation: He joined the team in 1945, and has been a member of the team ever since.

source: 在该球队效力期间，他出场 468 次攻入 403 球。
reference: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
translation: In his time at the club, he played 468 times for the club and scored 403 goals.

source: 没有人比博贝克 (Bobek) 的出场次数更多、为俱乐部进球得分更多的了。
reference: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
translation: Bobek has more appearances, has more goals scored for the club, and has more appearances and goals scored for the club than any other player.

source: 1995 年，他当选为游击队史上最佳球员。
reference: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
translation: In 1995, he was elected the best player of the游击队.

source: 世界著名的太阳马戏团上演了一场特别表演，为庆祝活动拉开了序幕。
reference: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
translation: The world famous circus presented a special performance to mark the event.

source: 紧随其后的是伊斯坦布尔国家交响乐团 (Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra)、一支禁卫军乐队以及歌手法提赫·埃尔科克 (Fatih Erkoc) 和穆斯林·古尔斯 (Muslum Gurses)。
reference: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
translation: The following followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a national orchestra, and the singer Fatih Erkoc and Muslim Gurses.

source: 然后，旋转的苦行僧出现在舞台上。
reference: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
translation: Then, the monk appeared on stage.

source: 土耳其歌剧女歌唱家茜泽·阿克苏 （Sezen Aksu）与意大利男高音亚历山德罗·沙费纳（Alessandro Safina）和希腊歌手哈里斯·阿莱克修（Haris Alexiou）同台表演。
reference: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
translation: The Turkish singer Sezen Aksu and Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou performed together.

source: 作为压轴，土耳其舞蹈团”安纳托利亚之火“表演了节目《特洛伊》。
reference: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
translation: As the closing act, the Turkish Ballet presented the "Troy" show.

source: 13 岁的摩托车赛车手彼得·伦茨在印第安纳波利斯赛车场上发生车祸丧生。
reference: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
translation: Peter Lenz died in Indianapolis on the motorcycle racer's 13-year-old motorcycle.

source: 在赛道上热身时，伦茨 (Lenz) 从自行车上摔了下来，然后被跟在后面的赛车手泽维尔·扎亚特 (Xavier Zayat) 撞到。
reference: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
translation: In the race, Lenz fell down from his bike, and was hit by Zayat.

source: 当时，在场的医务人员立即对他进行了抢救，并将他送往当地一家医院，后来他因救治无效身亡。
reference: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
translation: At the time, the medical staff immediately treated the man, and he was taken to a local hospital, where he died a few hours later.

source: 遭遇事故的扎亚特没有受伤。
reference: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
translation: The accident did not injure Zayat.

source: 关于全球金融形势，萨帕特罗继续说道：“金融体系是经济的一部分，一个关键部分。
reference: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
translation: In his closing remarks, Zapatero said that the financial system is part of the economy, a key part.

source: “金融危机持续了一年之久，以过去两个月最为严重，我认为现在金融市场正在开始复苏。”
reference: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
translation: "The financial crisis has been going on for a year, and the worst was in the last two weeks. I think the market is beginning to recover."

source: 上周，裸体新闻 (Naked News) 宣布将推出三档新的广播节目，以此大幅增加其在新闻报道中的国际语言授权。
reference: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
translation: The station announced that it will launch three new radio programs in the next few weeks, to increase its international language license.

source: 该全球组织已经使用英语和日语进行报道，目前正在为电视、网络和移动设备推出西班牙语、意大利语和韩语节目。
reference: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
translation: The organization has been using English and Japanese for its reporting, and is currently broadcasting its Spanish, Italian and Korean programs on television, the Internet and mobile devices.

source: “幸运的是我没有发生什么事，但我看到了可怕的一幕，人们试着打破窗户逃出去。
reference: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
translation: "幸运的是我没有发生什么事，但我看到了可怕的一幕，人们试图打破窗户逃出去。

source: 人们用椅子敲打玻璃，但窗户却坚不可摧。
reference: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
translation: People hammer glass with chairs, but the window is still strong.

source: 幸存者弗朗齐歇克·科瓦尔说：“终于有一块玻璃碎了，他们开始从窗户逃出去。”
reference: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
translation: The survivor Franchise Charles Corvo said, "They were escaping from the window."

source: 恒星会散发光和热，这是因为氢原子结合（或聚变）在一起形成更重的元素时产生了能量。
reference: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
translation: The star emits light and heat because hydrogen atoms combine (or fuse) to form heavier elements.

source: 科学家目前致力打造一种可通过相同的方式产生能量的反应堆。
reference: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
translation: Scientists are currently working on a way to create energy from the same way.

source: 然而，这是一个很难解决的问题。需要很多年的时间，我们才能看到实用的聚变反应堆建成。
reference: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
translation: However, this is a very difficult problem. It will take many years to build a practical reactor.

source: 由于表面张力的作用，钢针可以浮在水面上。
reference: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
translation: The surface tension acts to pull the needle up on the water.

source: 发生表面张力的原因，是水面的水分子之间互相强烈吸引，它们之间的引力比与水分子与上方空气分子之间的吸引力要大。
reference: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
translation: The reason for surface tension is that the water molecules are attracted by each other, and the attraction is stronger than the attraction between the water molecules and the air molecules.

source: 水分子在水的表面形成了一层看不见的外皮，这层外皮可以让针这样的东西浮在水面上。
reference: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
translation: Water molecules form a thin invisible layer on the surface of water, which allows the needle to float on the surface.

source: 现代溜冰鞋的刀刃是双刃的，刃与刃之间有一个凹洞。双刃对冰有更好的抓力（即使是在倾斜的时候）。
reference: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
translation: Modern ice skates have a blade that is split into two, and the blade is in the middle. The blade is better at catching ice (even when it is slanted) than a single blade.

source: 由于刀片的底部略弯曲，当刀片歪向其中一侧时，与冰接触的刀边弯曲了。
reference: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
translation: The blade is slightly curved at the bottom, when the blade is bent towards one side.

source: 这样一来，溜冰者就可以转弯。冰刀向右倾斜，溜冰者就转向右边。冰刀向左倾斜，溜冰者就转向左边。
reference: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translation: This way, the skater can turn around. The ice knife is tilted to the left, the skater turns around. The ice knife is tilted to the right, the skater turns around.

source: 它们必须消除从光中得到的多余能量。，才能恢复到之前的能量等级。
reference: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translation: They must remove the excess energy from the light to restore their original energy level.

source: 它们是通过发射一种被称为“光子”的微小光粒子做到这一点的。
reference: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translation: They use a tiny particle called "photon" to do this.

source: 科学家把这一过程称为“受激辐射”，因为原子受到强光的刺激，引起光子的发射，而光也是辐射的一种。
reference: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translation: The scientist called this process "irradiation" because the atom was stimulated by strong light, which caused the atom to emit light, and light is also a radiation.

source: 下一张图片显示的是原子发射光子的情况。当然，实际上光子要比图片上的样子小得多。
reference: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translation: The next picture shows the process of a photon being emitted. In fact, the photon is smaller than the picture shows.

source: 光子甚至比构成原子的物质还要小！
reference: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translation: The electron even has less mass than the constituent atoms!

source: 使用几百个小时后，灯丝最终被烧坏，而灯泡也不亮了。
reference: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translation: After a few hours, the light bulb finally burned out, and the light bulb didn't work.

source: 然后需要更换灯泡。更换灯泡时必须小心操作。
reference: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translation: Then, you need to replace the bulb. Replace the bulb must be done carefully.

source: 首先，务必关闭照明灯具的开关或断开电缆连接。
reference: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translation: First, turn off the light bulbs or disconnect the cable.

source: 这是因为，当灯泡还有一部分与插座相连时，当你接触到插座内部或灯泡的金属底座时，电流会流入插座（灯泡金属底座的连接处），让你受到严重的电击。
reference: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
translation: This is because, when the light bulb is still connected to the power cord, when you touch the bulb's metal base, the current will flow into the bulb (the base of the light bulb). This can cause serious electric shock.

source: 循环系统的主要器官是心脏，心脏负责输送血液。
reference: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
translation: The heart is the main organ of the circulatory system. The heart pumps blood.

source: 血液通过被称为动脉的管道从心脏流出，然后通过称为静脉的管道回流到心脏。最小的管道叫做毛细血管。
reference: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
translation: Blood flows through the arteries to the heart, then through the veins to the heart. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.

source: 三角龙的牙齿不仅能咬碎树叶，还能咬碎非常坚硬的树枝和树根。
reference: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
translation: The teeth of the tiger can also break down very hard wood, and even break down very tough branches and roots.

source: 一些科学家认为，三角龙以苏铁为食，苏铁是白垩纪时期很常见的一种植物。
reference: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
translation: Some scientists believe that the三角龙 is eating a kind of plant called Sphagnum. Sphagnum is a kind of plant that was common in the late Cretaceous.

source: 这些植物看起来像一棵小棕榈树，树冠由钉子般的锋利叶子组成。
reference: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
translation: These plants look like a palm tree, with a thick, pointed bark.

source: 在吃树干之前，三角龙会用它强有力的喙嘴剥去树叶。
reference: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
translation: Before eating the tree, the tiger will use its powerful claws to remove the leaves.

source: 其他科学家认为这些植物有毒，所以恐龙不太可能吃它们，即便现在树懒和其他动物例如鹦鹉（恐龙的后代）可以吃有毒的叶子或水果。
reference: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
translation: Other scientists believe these plants are poisonous, so dinosaurs wouldn't eat them, even if they could eat the poisonous leaves or fruits.

source: 木卫一的重力会对我产生怎样的作用力？如果你站在木卫一表面，你的体重会比在地球上轻。
reference: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
translation: What will the gravity of the Moon have on me? If you stand on the Moon, your weight will be lighter than on Earth.

source: 一个在地球上重 200 磅（90公斤）的人，在木卫一上的重量约为 36 磅（16公斤）。因此重力理所当然地对你产生了较小的牵引力。
reference: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
translation: A person weighing 200 pounds (90 kilograms) on the planet will have a weight of 36 pounds (16 kilograms) on the moon. This is because gravity acts on you less.

source: 太阳并没有像地球那样可以站在上面的地壳。整个太阳是由气体、火和等离子体组成的。
reference: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
translation: The sun does not appear to be on the surface of the earth. The sun is made of gas, fire and plasma.

source: 当你距离太阳中心越远，气体就越稀薄。
reference: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
translation: As you get closer to the center of the sun, the gas becomes less dense.

source: 我们看到的太阳外部称作光球层，意即“光之球”。
reference: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
translation: We see the sun as a sphere of light, which is called the "light sphere".

source: 约三千年后，也就是在1610年，意大利的天文学家伽利略·伽利莱（Galileo Galilei）使用望远镜观测天体，发现金星具有着与月球一致的相位。
reference: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
translation: In 1610, astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe the Sun, and discovered that the Sun's position was the same as that of the Moon.

source: 相变的发生是因为金星（或月球）只有面向太阳的一边被照到。金星的相变支持了哥白尼的理论，即行星围绕太阳旋转。
reference: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translation: The process of changing is due to the fact that the moon (or the sun) is only facing the sun. The moon's change of state supports the Copernican theory, that the planets revolve around the sun.

source: 然后，几年后的 1639 年，一位名叫耶利米·霍罗克斯 (Jeremiah Horrocks) 的英国天文学家观测到了一次金星凌日。
reference: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translation: In 1639, Jeremiah Horrocks observed a金星 eclipse.

source: 重新征服丹麦法区域 (Danelaw) 后，英格兰经历了很长的和平时期。
reference: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translation: After the Danish-French War, England was in a long period of peace.

source: 然而，在 991 年，埃塞尔雷德面对的是一个世纪前的古斯鲁姆舰队之后最大的维京舰队。
reference: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translation: However, in 991, Elred faced a much larger Viking fleet than ever before.

source: 这支舰队由奥拉夫·特里格瓦松率领。他是挪威人，志在将挪威从丹麦手中夺回来。
reference: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translation: The fleet was commanded by Olaf Trygvasson. He was a Norwegian, and was determined to take Norway back from Denmark.

source: 在初期军事失利之后，埃塞尔雷德终于与奥拉夫达成协议，奥拉夫重返挪威试图夺回王位，但算不上成功。
reference: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translation: After the initial defeat, Elred finally reached an agreement with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to take the throne, but was unsuccessful.

source: 韩文字母是唯一一个特意发明供日常使用的字母表，是于 1444 年世宗皇帝（1418 - 1450）统治时期所发明的。
reference: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translation: The Korean alphabet is the only one invented for everyday use, and was invented in 1444 by the reigning emperor (1418 - 1450) in the reign of世宗皇帝 (1418 - 1450).

source: 世宗大王为朝鲜王朝的第四任君主，也是最受推崇的君主之一。
reference: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translation: The King of Korea was the fourth king of the Korean dynasty, and was regarded as one of the most respected rulers.

source: 他最初将韩语字母发音表命名为“训民正音”，意思是“用于教导人民的正确发音”。
reference: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translation: He first created the pronunciation chart called "Dr. Hanyu Shu." This chart was intended to be used for teaching the pronunciation of Chinese characters.

source: 关于梵语的起源有很多说法。其中之一是雅利安人从西方移民到印度，将自己的语言带到这里。
reference: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translation: There are many different theories about the origin of梵文。 One of them is that the Aryan people from western migrated to India, and their language was brought to this country.

source: 梵语是一种古老的语言，能与欧洲的拉丁语相媲美。
reference: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translation: 梵语是一种古老的语言，能与欧洲的拉丁语相媲美。

source: 世界上已知最早的书是用梵文写的。《奥义书》编撰完成后，梵文由于等级制度的原因逐渐消失。
reference: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translation: The oldest known written book is written in Sanskrit. The work was completed in the 6th century BCE, when Sanskrit was superseded by a hierarchical system.

source: 梵语是一种博大精深的语言，也是许多现代印度语的起源，就像拉丁语是法语和西班牙语等欧洲语言的起源一样。
reference: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translation: 梵语是一种博大精深的语言，也是许多现代印度语的起源，就像拉丁语是法语和西班牙语等欧洲语言的起源一样。

source: 对法作战结束后，德国又开始为入侵不列颠岛做准备。
reference: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translation: After the war, Germany began preparing for invasion of Britain.

source: 德国将此次袭击的代号定为“海狮行动”。英国军队从敦刻尔克撤退时失去了大部分重型武器和补给，元气大伤。
reference: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translation: The German attack was called the "Sea Lion" operation. The British army withdrew from Dunkirk after losing most of its heavy weapons and supplies, and was badly damaged.

source: 但皇家海军还是比德国海军（“Kriegsmarine”）强得多，可以摧毁任何跨越英吉利海峡的入侵舰队。
reference: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translation: But the Royal Navy was much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could destroy any invasion fleet across the English Channel.

source: 然而，很少有皇家海军舰艇在潜在的入侵路线附近驻扎，因为海军将领们担心舰艇会被德国的空袭击沉。
reference: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translation: However, few Royal Navy ships are stationed in the vicinity of potential invasion routes, because the commanders fear that the ships will be sunk by German air attacks.

source: 让我们先来解释一下意大利的计划。意大利基本上属于德国和日本的“小兄弟”。
reference: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translation: Let's explain the Italian plan. It is basically a German and Japanese "daughter".

source: 该国陆军和海军都比较弱，尽管他们在战争开始前不久建造了四艘新舰船。
reference: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translation: The army and navy are weak, but they have recently built four new ships.

source: 意大利的主要目标是非洲国家。为了夺取这些国家，他们需要一个军队基地，以便军队可以驶穿地中海，入侵非洲。
reference: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translation: The Italian's main objective is Africa. To achieve this, they need a base for their army to cross the Mediterranean, invade Africa.

source: 为此，他们不得不将英国在埃及的基地和船舰撤出。除了采取这些行动，意大利的战舰本不应该有所行动。
reference: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translation: This is why they have to withdraw their British forces and ships from Egypt. They also have to withdraw their Italian forces from the Mediterranean.

source: 现在来看日本。和英国一样，日本是一个岛国。
reference: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translation: Now, let's look at Japan. Japan is a country on a island.

source: 潜水艇是为了在水底下行驶而设计的船，而且潜水艇在水面下停留的时间较长。
reference: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translation: The submarine is designed to be submerged and to remain submerged for longer periods of time.

source: 第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战期间都使用了潜水艇。 那时它们的速度很慢，射击范围也非常有限。
reference: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translation: During the First World War and the Second World War, submarines were used. They were very slow to move, and their range was very limited.

source: 在战争开始时，它们大多在海面上航行，但随着雷达的发展和精确度的提高，潜艇被迫潜入水下以免被发现。
reference: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translation: In the beginning, they were mostly on the water, but with the development of radar and the precision of the sonar, submarines were forced to sink to avoid being discovered.

source: 德国潜艇被称为 U 型潜艇。德国人非常擅长导航和操作潜艇。
reference: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translation: German submarines are called U's. Germans are very good at navigating and operating submarines.

source: 由于德国人在潜艇方面很成功，他们在战后不获托管大量潜艇。
reference: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translation: Because of the success of Germans in the submarines, they did not get much of a license for the remaining submarines.

source: 是的！图坦卡蒙国王，有时也被称为“图特王”或“少年国王”，他是现代最著名的古埃及国王之一。
reference: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translation: Yes! The Pharaoh of Tutankhamun is sometimes called the "Tutankhamun" or the "Young King", and is one of the most famous ancient Egyptians.

source: 有趣的是，他在古代并不被认为是举足轻重的人物，而且不被记录于大多数古代国王的名单。
reference: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translation: He is not considered a significant figure in ancient history, and is not mentioned in most ancient kings' lists.

source: 然而，1922 年发现了他的墓穴，让他成了名人。虽然有许多过去的坟墓被盗，但这座坟墓几乎未遭破坏。
reference: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translation: However, in 1922, he was discovered to have been buried in the graveyard, and became a famous man. There are many other graves that have been robbed, but this graveyard has hardly been disturbed.

source: 图坦卡蒙的大部分陪葬品都保存完好，其中包括数千件由贵金属和稀有宝石制成的文物。
reference: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translation: The majority of Tutankhamun's remains are preserved, including thousands of precious metal and rare gemmed artifacts.

source: 辐轮的发明使亚述人的战车更轻便、更迅速，行驶起来可以更轻松地超过士兵和其他战车。
reference: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translation: The invention of the wheel made the chariot of Assyria lighter, faster, and more comfortable to move.

source: 他们从致命的十字弓中射出的利箭，能穿透敌军的盔甲。公元前 1000 年前后，亚述人使用了第一批骑兵。
reference: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translation: They fired arrows from a deadly crossbow, which penetrated the armor of the enemy. Around 1000 BC, the Assyrians used the first cavalry.

source: 骑兵是指在马背上作战的军队。当时尚未发明马鞍，因此亚述骑兵只能骑在光秃秃的马背上作战。
reference: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translation: The word "mount" refers to the horse. The Egyptians were not yet invented the horse, so they had to ride on bare legs.

source: 我们知道许多希腊政治家、科学家和艺术家。希腊文化中最有名的人可能是有着传奇色彩的盲人诗人荷马。他创作了希腊文学的两部杰作：《伊利亚特》和《奥德赛》。
reference: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translation: We know many Greek politicians, scientists and artists. The most famous of them is the盲诗人荷马，他创作了希腊文学的两部杰作：《伊利亚特》和《奥德赛》。

source: 索福克勒斯（Sophocles ）和阿里斯托芬（Aristophanes）仍然是受欢迎的剧作家，他们的戏剧被认为是世界文学中最伟大的作品之一。
reference: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translation: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular writers, their plays are considered to be the greatest works of literature in the world.

source: 另一个著名的希腊人是数学家毕达哥拉斯，他最有名的成就是提出了关于直角三角形各边关系的著名定理。
reference: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translation: Another famous Greek was Pythagoras, the greatest mathematician of his time, who was known for his famous theorem on the relationship between the sides of a triangle.

source: 对于说印地语的人口数，有不同的说法。据估计，印地语是世界上第二到第四最常用的语言。
reference: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translation: According to the census, there are different estimates of the number of people speaking Hindi. According to the census, Hindi is the second most spoken language in the world.

source: 母语人数取决于紧密相关的方言是否计算在内。
reference: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translation: The number of native speakers is dependent on whether the language is included in the count.

source: 据估计，会说这种语言的人数量范围在 3.4 亿到 5 亿之间，而能听懂这种语言的人则多达 8 亿。
reference: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translation: According to estimates, the number of people who can speak this language is between 3.4 and 5.4 billion, and those who can understand it is between 8.4 and 10.4 billion.

source: 印度语和乌尔都语有着相似的词汇，但文字的书写方式不同；在日常对话中，这两种语言通常可以交流互通。
reference: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translation: The two languages share similar words, but the writing style is different in everyday conversation.

source: 15 世纪前后，爱沙尼亚北部深受德国文化的影响。
reference: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translation: 15 世纪前后，爱沙尼亚北部深受德国文化的影响。

source: 一些德国修道士想让上帝更接近本国人，所以他们发明了爱沙尼亚文字语言。
reference: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translation: Some German修道士 wanted to make God closer to their own people, so they invented the Estonian language.

source: 它是在德语字母表中加了一个字母“Õ/õ”。
reference: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translation: It was added to the German alphabet by adding an extra letter "Õ/õ".

source: 随着时间的推移，许多德语外来词与原有词汇合并。这就是启蒙运动的开始。
reference: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translation: As time goes on, many German外来 words and their original words merge. This is the beginning of the enlightenment movement.

source: 传统上，王位继承人在完成学业后会直接入伍。
reference: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translation: Traditionally, the heir to the throne finishes his education and is immediately sent to the army.

source: 不过，查尔斯入读了剑桥大学三一学院，他在那里学习了人类学和考古学，后来又学习了历史学，获得了 2:2 学位（二等二学位）。
reference: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translation: However, Charles studied at the University of Cambridge, where he studied humanities and archaeology, and later studied history, obtaining a 2:2 degree (secondary degree).

source: 查尔斯是第一个获得学位的英国王室成员。
reference: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translation: Charles was the first British royal to graduate.

source: 土耳其位于欧洲的部分（地处巴尔干半岛的东色雷斯或鲁米利亚）占其国土面积的 3％。
reference: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translation: Turkey is located in the eastern part of Europe (in the region of the Balkan Peninsula) in its territory.

source: 土耳其领土长 1,600 多公里（1,000 英里），宽 800 公里（500 英里），大致呈矩形。
reference: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translation: The Turkish territory is 1,600 km (1,000 miles) long, 800 km (500 miles) wide, roughly rectangular.

source: 土耳其的国土面积（包括湖泊）为 783,562 平方公里（300,948 平方英里），其中 755,688 平方公里（291,773 平方英里）位于西南亚，23,764 平方公里（9,174 平方英里）位于欧洲。
reference: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translation: Turkey's land area includes 783,562 km2 (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 km2 (291,773 sq mi) is located in the South Asian region, 23,764 km2 (9,174 sq mi) in the European region.

source: 土耳其的面积在世界上排第 37 位，大约是法国本土和英国面积的总和。
reference: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translation: Turkey's area is ranked 37th in the world, and is roughly equal to the size of France and Britain combined.

source: 土耳其三面环海：西面是爱琴海，北面是黑海，南面则是地中海。
reference: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translation: Turkey is three times the size of Greece: it is on the east, on the south, and on the west.

source: 卢森堡历史悠久，但在 1839 年才独立成国。
reference: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translation: Luxembourg has been a country for centuries, but was independent in 1839.

source: 今天的比利时有部分地区过去属于卢森堡，但在 19 世纪 30 年代的比利时革命后被划入比利时。
reference: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translation: Today, some parts of Belgium are part of Luxembourg, but in the 19th century, Belgium was part of the Belgian Revolution.

source: 卢森堡一直试图成为中立国，但它在第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战中都曾被德国占领。
reference: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translation: Luxembourg has always tried to be neutral, but it was occupied in the First World War and in the Second World War.

source: 1957 年，卢森堡成为如今被称为欧盟的组织的创始成员国。
reference: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translation: In 1957, Luxembourg became the founding member of the European Union.

source: 朱克杰宗（Drukgyal Dzong）是一座已毁的堡垒和佛教寺庙，位于帕罗区上部（在方德村）。
reference: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translation: The Dzong of Dzong Kham (Drukgyal Dzong) is a ruined fortification and a Buddhist temple in the upper part of Paro (in the village of Dzong Kham).

source: 据说扎布隆·阿旺·纳姆耶尔 (Zhabdrung nawang Namgyel) 于 1649 年建造这座堡垒，是为了纪念自己战胜藏蒙军队。
reference: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translation: According to the legend, Zhabdrung nawang Namgyel built the fortification in 1649 to commemorate his victory over the Mongols.

source: 1951 年，一场大火导致杜克耶堡仅存一丝遗迹，例如扎布隆·阿旺·纳姆格亚尔（Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal）的雕像。
reference: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translation: In 1951, a fire destroyed the remains of the Dunkirk fortification, including the statue of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal (Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal's statue).

source: 火灾过后，堡垒得到维护和保护，成为不丹最备受瞩目的景点之一。
reference: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translation: Fire destroyed the fortification, and it was protected by the government, becoming one of the most popular tourist attractions in Bhutan.

source: 18 世纪的柬埔寨被夹在泰国和越南两个强邻之间。
reference: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translation: 18th century Cambodia was in the middle of Thailand and Vietnam.

source: 泰国人在 18 世纪曾多次入侵柬埔寨，并在 1772 年摧毁了金边。
reference: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translation: The Thai people have invaded Cambodia in the 18th century, and in 1772 they destroyed the capital, Phnom Penh.

source: 在 18 世纪的最后几年，越南人也入侵了柬埔寨。
reference: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translation: In the 18th century, Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.

source: 百分之十八的委内瑞拉人失业，而大部分就业者是非正规经济从业人员。
reference: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translation: The Venezuelan unemployment rate is over eighty percent, and most of the employed people are informal workers.

source: 三分之二的委内瑞拉人就是这样从事服务行业，接近四分之一的人从事工业，五分之一的人在农业行业里工作。
reference: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translation: The third quarter of Venezuelans are in the service industry, with a quarter in the industry, and a fifth in agriculture.

source: 委内瑞拉是石油净出口国，尽管只有百分之一的人在石油行业工作，但石油行业仍然是该国的重要产业。
reference: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translation: Venezuela is a net exporter of oil, although only one in ten people work in the oil industry. Oil is the country's main industry.

source: 在国家独立初期，新加坡植物园发挥其专业知识所长，帮助该岛成为了一座热带“花园城市”。
reference: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translation: In the early days of Singapore's independence, the Singapore Botanic Gardens played a leading role in helping the island become a tropical "green city".

source: 1981 年，卓锦万代兰被选为该国的国花。它是兰花的杂交品种。
reference: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translation: 1981, the Japanese rose was chosen as the country's national flower. It is a hybrid of roses.

source: 每年 10 月前后，大约有 150 万只食草动物从北部山区出发，穿过马拉河，前往雨水充足的南部平原。
reference: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translation: The animals travel in the spring, between October and November, and travel in large numbers to the drylands in the south.

source: 然后，在四月左右的雨季之后，从西部回到北部，再次穿越马拉河。
reference: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
translation: Then, in the spring of the following year, the river was again crossed by the south, and then returned to the north.

source: 塞伦盖蒂（Serengeti）地区包括塞伦盖蒂（Serengeti ）国家公园、坦桑尼亚的恩戈罗恩戈罗（Ngorongoro）自然保护区、马斯瓦（Maswa）野生动物保护区以及肯尼亚的马赛马拉（Maasai Mara）国家保护区。
reference: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
translation: The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti (Serengeti) National Park, Tanzania's Ngorongoro National Park, Maswa (Maswa) Wild Animal Park and Kenya's Masai Mara National Park.

source: 学习制作互动媒体需要常规传统技能，以及在互动课程中掌握的工具（故事板制作、音频和视频编辑、故事情节设计等）。
reference: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
translation: The course requires the traditional skills of traditional media production, and the tools (storyboards, audio and video editing, storytelling) that are required in interactive courses.

source: 交互设计要求你重新评估有关媒体制作的假设，并学会非线性思考。
reference: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
translation: Interactive design requires you to reevaluate your assumptions about media production, and to learn to think in a non-linear way.

source: 交互设计要求项目的各个组成部分相互联系，但也可以作为一个独立实体存在。
reference: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
translation: Interactive design requires that all the components of the project be interconnected, but can also be considered as an independent entity.

source: 变焦镜头的缺点是，要想实现一定的焦距范围，所需的焦距复杂度和透镜元件的数量远远大于定焦镜头。
reference: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
translation: The disadvantage of a zoom lens is that it requires a complex lens system and a large number of lens elements to achieve a certain focal length range.

source: 随着镜头制造商在镜头生产方面达到更高的标准，这已经不算什么问题了。
reference: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
translation: With the increasing standards of the lens makers, this is no longer a problem.

source: 这使得变焦镜头可以拍出与固定焦距镜头质量相媲美的照片。
reference: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
translation: This makes it possible to take pictures with a zoom lens that is comparable to the quality of a fixed focal length lens.

source: 变焦镜头的另一个缺点是镜头的最大光圈（速度）通常较小。
reference: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
translation: Another disadvantage of a zoom lens is that the maximum aperture (speed) is usually smaller.

source: 这使得廉价的变焦镜头在没有闪光灯的情况下很难在弱光条件下使用。
reference: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
translation: This makes it difficult to use a cheap zoom lens without flash in low light.

source: 在尝试将电影转换成 DVD 格式时，最常见的问题之一是过度扫描。
reference: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
translation: The most common problem with converting a movie to DVD format is over-scan.

source: 大多数电视节目都是为娱乐大众而制作的。
reference: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
translation: Most of the television shows are for entertainment of the general public.

source: 出于该原因，你在电视上看到的画面边框，包括顶部、底部和侧边，都被裁剪了。
reference: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
translation: This is due to this reason, you will see the borders of the TV screen, including the top, bottom and sides, are cut.

source: 这样做是为了保证图像能覆盖住整个屏幕。这叫做“过度扫描”。
reference: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
translation: Doing this is to ensure that the image covers the entire screen. This is called “over-scan.”

source: 遗憾的是，当你制作 DVD 时，它的边框很可能也会被裁剪掉，而且如果视频中的字幕太靠近底部，那么字幕也会显示不完整。
reference: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
translation: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, the borders of the disc may be cut off, and if the subtitles are too close to the bottom, the subtitles may not be complete.

source: 这座传统的中世纪城堡长久以来一直激发着人们的想象力，让人联想到马背长矛比武、宴会和亚瑟王骑士精神的画面。
reference: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
translation: This medieval castle has always inspired imagination, and has been linked to the idea of a knightly battle, banquet and the亚瑟王 knightly spirit.

source: 人们即使站在千年的废墟中，也很容易回想起早已逝去的战争的声音和气味，几乎能听到鹅卵石上马蹄的碰撞声，也能闻到从地牢坑里冒出来的恐惧气息。
reference: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
translation: People standing in the ruins of a thousand years ago, can easily recall the sound and smell of the war, and can hear the sound of the sound of the wheels of the old soldiers, and can smell the smell of the fearful atmosphere from the underground.

source: 但是我们的想象有现实依据吗？最初为什么要建城堡？它们是如何设计和建造的？
reference: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
translation: But did our imagination have any real basis? Why did we build the castle? What was the purpose of the castle? How did they build it?

source: 作为那段时期的典型建筑，与其说克尔比墨斯鲁（Muxloe）城堡是一座真正的城堡，不如说它是一座加固的房屋。
reference: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
translation: As a typical example of the period, it is better to say that the Muxloe castle is a true castle than it is a fortified building.

source: 它的大玻璃窗和薄墙不可能长时间抵抗得住一次坚决的攻击。
reference: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
translation: The glass windows and the thin walls cannot withstand a strong attack.

source: 15 世纪 80 年代，在黑斯廷斯勋爵（Lord Hastings）开始建造这座城堡的时候，这个国家还相对和平，只需要防御一小群四处游荡的抢掠者。
reference: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
translation: In 1580s, the Duke of Hastings began building the castle when the country was still relatively peaceful, and only needed to defend a small number of wandering thieves.

source: 权力的平衡是欧洲国家寻求维护全体欧洲国家国家主权的制度。
reference: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
translation: The balance of power is the European Union seeks to maintain the European Union as a whole.

source: 这种理念是，所有欧洲国家必须设法阻止某个国家/地区独自变得强大，因此，各国政府为了保持平衡经常更换盟友。
reference: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
translation: This is the idea that all European countries must try to prevent one country or region from becoming strong, so that governments try to maintain balance by changing their allies.

source: 西班牙继承权之战标志着第一场以权力平衡为核心问题的战争。
reference: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
translation: The Spanish succession battle marks the first battle of the key issue of power balance.

source: 这标志着一个重要的变化，因为欧洲大国将无法再以宗教战争为借口。因此，三十年战争将是最后一场被贴上宗教战争标签的战争。
reference: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
translation: This marks a significant change, because the European powers will no longer be able to use religion as a pretext to wage war. This will be the last war to be labeled as a religious war.

source: 公元前 356 年 7 月 21 日，赫洛斯塔图斯 (Herostratus) 的纵火行为导致位于以弗所 (Ephesus) 的阿尔忒弥斯神庙毁于一旦。
reference: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
translation: On 21 July 356, Herostratus' fire destroyed the temple of Apollo at Ephesus.

source: 据故事情节所写，此人愿不惜一切代价出人头地。愤慨的以弗所人宣布黑若斯达特斯（Herostratus）之名罄竹难书。
reference: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
translation: According to the story, this man is willing to sacrifice everything to get his name out there. The Pharisees, who had been trying to get Herostratus's name out there, declared him to be a liar.

source: 希腊历史学家斯特拉博 (Strabo) 后来提到了这个名字，也就是我们今天所熟知的名字。圣殿在亚历山大大帝出生的当晚被毁。
reference: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
translation: Strabo: The historian Strabo later referred to the name, which we now know as the name we know today. The temple was destroyed by Alexander the Great's birth.

source: 亚历山大大帝原本提议重建这座神庙，但其提案遭到拒绝。随后，在亚历山大死后，该神庙于公元前 323 年得以重建。
reference: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
translation: The Roman Emperor proposed to rebuild the temple, but was rejected. After the death of Alexander, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BC.

source: 确保你的手尽可能地放松，同时仍可以正确地敲击所有的音符—手指也尽量不要做太多无关的动作。
reference: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
translation: Ensure that your hand is relaxed, while still being able to hit all the notes correctly. Your fingers should not do anything that is not necessary.

source: 这样就能让你尽可能节省体力。记住，不用像在钢琴上那样用力敲击琴键来提升音量。
reference: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
translation: This will make it easier for you to save your energy. Remember, don't use the same technique as in the piano to raise the volume.

source: 为了提高手风琴的音量，可以更用力或以更快的速度拉风箱。
reference: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
translation: To increase the volume of the piano, you can use more force or faster speed to open the case.

source: 神秘主义追求与终极现实、神性、精神真理或上帝进行交流、认同或达成知觉意识。
reference: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
translation: Mysticism seeks to communicate with ultimate reality, divine, spiritual truth or God.

source: 信徒们寻求一种对神圣的现实/神性或诸神的直接体验、直觉或者顿悟。
reference: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
translation: The Christian seeks a direct experience of the divine reality, the divine or divine reality, or the divine.

source: 追随者追求某种生活方式或旨在滋养这些经验的修行。
reference: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
translation: Followers pursue a lifestyle or a way of life that is intended to nourish these experiences.

source: 神秘主义可以与其他形式的宗教信仰和崇拜区分开来，因为它强调对独特意识状态的个人直接体验，特别是那些和平的、有洞察力的、幸福的、甚至是狂喜的意识状态。
reference: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
translation: Mysticism can be distinguished from other religions and beliefs by its emphasis on personal direct experience, especially those of peace, insight, joy, or even happiness.

source: 锡克教是来自印度次大陆的一种宗教。它在 15 世纪起源于旁遮普地区，来自印度教传统的内部宗派分裂。
reference: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
translation: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian subcontinent. It originated in the southern part of the Punjab in the 15th century, from the internal sectarian divisions of the Hindu religion.

source: 锡克教徒认为，他们信仰的是与印度教不同的一种宗教，尽管他们承认锡克教源自印度教，也包含印度教的传统。
reference: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
translation: Sikhs believe that they are a different religion from the Hindu religion, despite their acknowledgement of Sikhism from the Hindu religion, and also includes the Hindu traditions.

source: 锡克教徒把自己的宗教称为 Gurmat，在旁遮普语中是“古鲁（导师）之路”的意思。古鲁是所有印度宗教的基本组成部分，但在锡克教中地位特别高，成为了锡克教信仰的核心。
reference: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
translation: Sikhism is called Gurmat, in Punjabi it is called Guru (the path) and in Hindi इसे Sikhism कहा जाता है। यह सभी भारतीय धर्मों का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है, लेकिन सिख धर्म में इसकी विशेष स्थान है, जो सिख धर्म की मुख्यधारा है।

source: 该宗教于 15 世纪由古鲁·纳纳克 (1469-1539) 创立。随后又有九位古鲁。
reference: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.
translation: The religion was founded by the Gurdwara Guru Nanak (1469-1539) in 1515. Then, there were nine Gurdwaras.

source: 然而，在 1956 年 6 月，当波兰工人抗议食品短缺和减薪的骚乱演变成对共产主义制度本身的抗议时，赫鲁晓夫的承诺面临着考验。
reference: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.
translation: In 1956, when the Polish workers protested food shortages and wage cuts, the promise of the communist party was under threat.

source: 尽管在最后，赫鲁晓夫派出坦克恢复了秩序，但他还是对一些经济要求做出了让步，并同意任命受民众欢迎的瓦迪斯瓦夫·哥穆尔卡 (Wladyslaw Gomulka) 为新总理。
reference: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.
translation: Despite the final order, the Soviet leader ordered tanks to restore order, but he also agreed to allow the appointment of a popular leader, Wladyslaw Gomulka, as the new prime minister.

source: 印度河流域文明是青铜时代的文明，位于印度西北部次大陆，覆盖的区域包括了现代巴基斯坦的大部分地区，以及印度西北部和阿富汗东北部的一些地区。
reference: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.
translation: The Indian Valley civilization is a Bronze Age civilization, located in the Indian subcontinent, covering the western part of Pakistan, the eastern part of Afghanistan, and parts of western India.

source: 印度河盆地的文明发展繁荣，该文明因此得名。
reference: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.
translation: The Indian River basin has developed a civilization, which is known as the civilization.

source: 尽管一些学者推测，鉴于这一文明也存在于如今已然干涸的萨拉斯瓦蒂河流域，将该文明称为“印度河-萨拉斯瓦蒂河文明”才算恰如其分，不过一些人称其为“哈拉帕文明”——得名于20世纪20年代在该区域发掘的第一个遗址“哈拉帕”。
reference: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
translation: The scholars have suggested that the name "Harappa civilization" is a misnomer, since the region was discovered in the 1930s, and the first archaeological site was named "Harappa".

source: 罗马帝国的军国主义性质促进了医学的进步和发展。
reference: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
translation: The Roman Empire's military character promoted medical progress and development.

source: 奥古斯都皇帝开始招募医生，甚至组建了第一支罗马医疗队，用于战后医疗。
reference: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
translation: Augustus began recruiting doctors, and even formed the first Roman medical force for the post-war reconstruction.

source: 外科医生对各种镇静剂都有了解，包括从罂粟种子中提取的吗啡和从莨菪种子中提取的东莨菪碱。
reference: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
translation: The doctor knows about various sedatives, including the use of morphine from the seeds of the marijuana plant and the use of the alkaloids from the seeds of the Echinacea plant.

source: 除了用止血带和动脉钳来阻止血液流动外，他们已能熟练通过截肢来挽救坏疽患者。
reference: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
translation: They have learned to use tourniquets and arteriographers to stop blood flow. They can now successfully treat patients with gangrene.

source: 在几个世纪里，罗马帝国在医学领域取得了巨大成果，构成了我们今天所知晓的大部分知识。
reference: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
translation: In the last few centuries, the Roman Empire has made great progress in medicine, and has made a significant contribution to our knowledge today.

source: 净土折纸，其限制规则是一次只能进行一次折叠，不允许反向折叠这样更复杂的动作，并且所有折叠的位置都必须简单明了。
reference: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
translation: The rule for the paper cutter is that it can only cut one piece at a time, and that it cannot reverse the direction of the cut. All the cuts must be simple and clear.

source: 它是由约翰•史密斯 (John Smith) 在 20 世纪 70 年代研发的，用于帮助缺乏经验的折纸人或动手能力差的人。
reference: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
translation: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s. It is used to help inexperienced or weak hands.

source: 孩子还小的时候，就能意识到种族和种族刻板印象，这些种族刻板印象会影响其行为。
reference: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
